name: Pong Reverse
description:
Pong Reverse is a Gamemaker remake of the classic arcade game where you control the ball. My goal was to make a game with tons of events, bonus and enemies but I canceled the dev because I now use Godot. You can download two versions of the game, one ugly but with few features and one beautiful (the one I never finished) without cool features. Maybe one day I'll finish it ¯\_(ツ)_/¯ .

Made by Thomas Csigai with Gamemaker.
